headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From Nordson’s Q2 Earnings Call
summary: Nordson’s second quarter was marked by strong demand in its Advanced Technology Solutions and Medical and Fluid Solutions segments, which helped the company surpass Wall Street expectations for both revenue and non-GAAP earnings per share. Management credited the ongoing integration of the Atrion acquisition as a key factor in expanding the medical product portfolio, particularly in proprietary fluid delivery and cardiovascular solutions.
